value:
$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|The outer gate has been breached!
The apostle's army is storming the
castle!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|Where...am I?$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Maiden of Dawn! The enemy is
approaching. Please, you must
withdraw inside the castle!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|This... This is when Daein's forces
were broken, on the verge of defeat...$k$pBut why?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Time and space intermingle...and
become distorted. Such is the
confusion sowed by the tempest.$k$pQueen Micaiah of Daein, the events
you once experienced have been
engulfed by a maelstrom of chaos.$k$pI must ask for your aid in restoring
this world to the way it should be.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|If we are at that time, in that place...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The foe you must overcome now is
the selfsame you faced back then:
The Radiant Hero, Ike.$k$pHe is a Brave Hero, just as you are,
and one whose tale has become
legend...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|General Ike... We fought him here,
and we lost.$k$pHis strength is unmatched, yet he is
willing to risk everything to save a
single life...$k$pWhen one speaks of a "true hero,"
his name is foremost.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Yes.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|My heroism pales in comparison...
But if it is for the people of Daein,
I will fight.$k$pEven if my foe is none other than
the Radiant Hero...$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|And with that, this world is saved...
This is all thanks to you. You have
my gratitude.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|It is I who should thank you. I want
nothing more than to save Daein.$k$pPrince Marth, I must ask... You have
traveled to many realms and met
many Heroes, have you not?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I have.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|Then let me ask you this: what makes
a Hero?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Well...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|I desired to end the suffering of the
people. That was my ideal.$k$pBut in the end, we were driven to
a hopeless battle, and I was forced
to make a difficult choice.$k$pThe people found a ray of hope
within me. They believed in me.
They fought for me.$k$pBut they were cut down, one after
another—punished for that faith.$k$pWhat is a Hero? Can you say that I
am one?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|You must forgive me, but I do not
have an answer to the question you
first posed.$k$pI, too, have found myself in a dire
struggle. Many lost their lives, and
I felt much the same as you do.$k$pEven so...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|Yes. Even so...I cannot shrink from
my duty. No matter my fate, I must
see it through.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|Perhaps General Ike felt the
same way.$k$pHeroes tread a path laid with
sorrows, indeed...$k$p
